response.overview: Released by NFL Films on VHS in 1986, Broncomania! focuses on the Denver Broncos' most remarkable victories, the defense's established stars as well as the new ones, and the current flashy offensive performers. There is even extensive action footage from the first ten games of the Broncos' 1986 season that demonstrates the qualities that make this team so special to its fans. The film reaches a rousing conclusion with a lively "music video" which matches up exciting Broncos' action and colorful game day scenes to the hot sounds of Kool and the Gang performing "Victory."
response.title: Broncomania!

release_dates.note: VHS release date estimated based on inclusion of footage from as late as Nov. 9, 1986.
